thread.title: Theresa Marchione - Tarock Music
thread.title_full: Disc Makers reviewed by Theresa Marchione - Tarock Music

author: Theresa Marchione - Tarock Music
title: Theresa Marchione - Tarock Music
text:
Tarock Music has used Disc Makers for 10 album releases, and will continue using them for all our future projects.
Our albums are mastered by engineer Brian Lipski, and we never need to request changes because it's mastered perfectly the first time.
We especially like Disc Maker's on-line jacket artwork software because it's easy to use, and the finished CD's always look great.
